title: The 'Kundan Kiran' Diamond Choker Haaram - A Sparkle of Tradition
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance and exceptional shine.
features: This exquisite choker features a floral-inspired design, reinterpreting traditional Kundan motifs with a modern diamond setting. The intricate openwork design adds a delicate and airy feel, while the structured gold mesh chain ensures comfortable wear. Each diamond is meticulously set to maximize its brilliance.
colors: Predominantly Yellow Gold with dazzling White Diamonds
creating a classic and timeless color palette.
occasions: and sophisticated festive occasions. A statement piece that adds a touch of timeless elegance to any ensemble.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design, this choker is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and diamond quality. Its lightweight design ensures comfort and ease of wear, making it a treasured heirloom for generations to come. Ethically sourced diamonds guarantee responsible luxury.
